title: Print, "Proofs for four plates of "Alfabeto in Sogno" [Dream Alphabet]: Letter I", 1683
medium: White laid paper with red crayon
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Central image of a girl carrying a flower basket that forms the letter I with additional drawings of eight profiles of men and boys; a hedgehog.  Reverse: an eye; a subdivided square; pencil.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Proofs for four plates of "Alfabeto in Sogno" [Dream Alphabet]: Letter I", 1683.
1683. White laid paper with red crayon. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1944-24-8-c.
